text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Turn up～～！！

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
C'mon everybody!! Clap yo hands! 
Raise em up high and clap yo hands!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
When you smile ♪ it's party time! 
♪ We'll double the fun!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Then・here・comes～? BAM Heli-turn! 
Dancing on air with my lady! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: (————what is this……?)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: (The committee members…… they're, rehearsing……?)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Put yo hands up! Put yo hands up! Come on everybody!

text_block_list.name: Committee Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I can't hear you! Shout it out!! C'mon Bamcham!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Yeah! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: And you? You're up? C'mon Zephachi～!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Yeah♪ Yeah♪

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Keep goin! That's what I'm talkin about! Let's goーー everybody! !

text_block_list.name: Committee Members
text_block_list.text: YEAH! ! YEAH! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Alrightー! ! Keep your arms up and! 
Spin around and jump! Jump around and spin!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
When you smile, it's a happy time! 
Sing along!

text_block_list.name: Committee Members
text_block_list.text: The sun always shines by your side♪

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You don't want to forget it? We'll keep on chatting along, 
even the ones next to you get involved! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Round and round! Dance・dance・dance～～! ! Fu～～～～! !

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haha～ amazing……!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: (…………This is, Helios' performance)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(This energy…… 
This is what I was missing……)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ah! ! My ladyーー! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Princess Princess Princess! ! Did you see! ? So! ? 
Doesn't it look like a really fun Droite!?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
——Yes it does. Will these costumes 
be worn for the actual performance?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Oh, this? Yeah! ! I want to be my lady's escort! ! 
I made this cause I wanna have fun with you!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Hey, My lady!! If we have fun together, 
we'll definitely get best date!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Please be my date! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ————……alright.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Please go with——………… Ah? eh? Did you just say "alright"? 
Yes? Okay? ? Forreal? ? ? ?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Helios-san, your energy and emotion, it has the 
power to attract others. So I've decided.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——I look forward to going with you.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: YEEEEEEEEEESSーーーー! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Goin on a date with my lady ♡ 
Lovey Dovey lesson ♪ nnhehehehehe～♡

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Thank you for waiting, Helios-san.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ah, My l——……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Eh, eh! ? ! ? ! ? ! ? So cute! ? ! ? 
Huh, huh, that's your outfit! ? ! ? Wha! ? ! ?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Yes. As I have informed you, 
today we'll be doing a dress rehearsal.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, lets！！ So uh, blue! ? That's my color! ? 
And the flame motif too! ! Twinning～～! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
So you wanted to match! ? 
Is this………… love?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
No, not particularly. 
However…….

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——I shall return passion, with passion.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
——! Yeah! ! Let's have a ton of fun! ! 
I'm gonna give you the most fun you ever had! !
